wikipedia_api module

wikipedia_api.countries(save=False)[source]

Get a list of all countries.

Parameters

save (bool) – Whether to save the list of countries to a file.

Returns

A list of countries.

Return type

list[str]

wikipedia_api.countries_by_area(order='DESC')[source]

Get all countries and their area.

Parameters

order (str) – The order in which the countries should be returned.

Returns

A string with all countries and their area.

Return type

str
